page.title: 07THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 6
page.content: the people do their main shopping in Marks Tey,{95%}do theirs in Colchester. For food shopping most people go to Sainsburys in Lexden, Colchester or Fiveways Superstore (Co_Op)in Stanway, Colchester. Most would like more shops nearer the estate. Many would like a chemist and a doctors surgery. Some would like a bank and a fish and chip shop. {Other facilities}existing in Marks Tey include three public houses, a primary school, two play schools, allotments, a playing field, village hall, two garden centres, three churches, (two Church of England, one Methodist) and various clubs and organisations for adults and children.There are of course excellent bus and train services to many places including { {London}( 26 trains per day taking about 50 minutes). (E.Wareham)
